items.sentence: I'm going to have to listen to that in a bit.
Tom put his spoon down and picked up his cup.
Tom picked his toys up and put them in a box.
Would you mind watching my kids for a minute?
Tom wanted to join the gang that John was in.
While you're driving, watch out for potholes.
We enjoyed ourselves at the party last night.
Don't you think that necklace is a bit gaudy?
Tom gobbled up everything I had stashed away.
Yanni doesn't even know how to use that tool.
If you find yourself in a hole, stop digging.
I played tennis for the first time yesterday.
At first I assumed it wouldn't last for long.
I want you to take Tom to Australia with you.
I don't go to Australia as much as I used to.
I've decided not to go to Australia with Tom.
I don't want to stay in Australia any longer.
I expect to stay in Australia a month or two.
I go to Australia three or four times a year.
Tom didn't want to admit he'd made a mistake.
